QuestData.Title: The Tools of One's Trade
QuestData.Description:
A forge of this power needs specialized tools--ones that can take the tremendous heat.
But the djaradin have ransacked the place and stole many of the tools we need for this work.
If you can, recover those tools from them, so that we may continue our efforts to arm our allies.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $4oa Precision Scale Hammer, $3oa Obsidian Bickern, $2oa Blacksteel Tongs, and $1oa Dragonclaw Punches.
